name: quizondrive
0:
”Alexa, open quiz on drive”
”Alexa, play quiz on drive”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quiz on drive
des:
Test your knowledge of the US states and their capitals on a drive in your Alexa device in the vehicle.

States Quiz provides a fun way to keep your U.S. geography skills sharp.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch quiz on drive" or "Alexa, open quiz on drive" to start the game".

At anytime, you can stop the game by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
